ReturnPolicy.Description:
At diamondisland08, our goal is for us to help you find jewelry you love. If you are not satisfied with your purchase, you can return or exchange the item(s) within 30 days from the date of purchase. The return.

Item cannot be altered or customized from its original design. Custom orders include, but are not limited to: items with engraving, rings that have been sized, and personalized jewelry.
Item must be in an unused condition with no signs of wear, damage, or abuse.
Item must have the original manufacturers tags attached.
Item must be packaged with tracking AND insurance, and cannot be poorly packaged.
Item must be returned with 30 days from the date of purchase

Title: Sterling Silver 10inch Polished Antiqued Pink Crystal Beaded Anklet
Description: Sterling Silver A family-owned and operated business, Diamondisland08 was founded in the New York Metropolitan area with the premise that we provide superior quality and customer service to our clientele in the Tri-State area. We are proud to offer our clientele a wide range of products including: beautiful polished diamonds, colored diamonds in a range of exciting colors (pink, rainbow-red, orange, yellow, blue and green), loose gemstones and fine designer jewelry. Our quality is unsurpassed and all of our collections cater to the latest fashion trends. Our guarantee is that we promise to treat our clientele with the care, attention, and respect that we would with our family. We are proud to say that we are also diamond wholesalers based in the New York Metropolitan area, and because of that, we are able to pass the savings on to you because we sell directly to the public. This business strategy and using the internet to sell directly at the best possible prices is why we have a steady clientele base that we strive to build personal relationships with.....not just to make another sale. Thank you for being a part of the Diamond Island family!
